text: It's a shame that female folks in our field still have to deal with this kind of crap. Commenting on the looks or "hotness" of your fellow professionals is just not ok, it's that simple. https://t.co/nwcvE54OIN

author.name: Gunnar Morling 🌍
author.description: Software engineer @ Decodable · Ex-lead of Debezium · Spec lead of Bean Validation 2.0 · Creator of JfrUnit, kcctl and MapStruct · Java Champion · 🚴
